A B C G I M O P R S U

B

bind() - Method in class org.mvp4j.adapter.ActionComponent
Bind the current component with the current action in the presenter Add the current type event(or the default event if is not specified) to the current view component and call the presenter action associated when the event is invoked if the event type is specified and is not supported, than throw an IllegalArgumentException
bind() - Method in class org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelComponent
Bind the current component with the current model Add the change event to the current view component and call the setPropertyValue to update the current property in the model when the event is called
bind(Object, Object, Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.AppController
Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter throw IllegalArgumentException if the view, model and presenter instances classes are not associated Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated model properties and presenter actions.
bindModel(Object, Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.AppController
Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model throw IllegalArgumentException if the model and view instances classes are not associated.
bindPresenter(Object, Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.AppController
Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter throw IllegalArgumentException if the view and presenter instances classes are not associated Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated presenter actions.
